title: microformats2 h-entry
description: h-entry is the microformats2 vocabulary for marking up blog posts on web sites. It can also be used to mark-up any other episodic or time series based content.

bookmark-of.title: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.
bookmark-of.description: URL to use in h-card, h-entry, h-event, etc.

in-reply-to.title: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.
in-reply-to.description: URL to use in h-card, h-entry, h-event, etc.

like-of.title: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.
like-of.description: URL to use in h-card, h-entry, h-event, etc.

name.title: Name of the entry, event, item, product, etc.
name.description: Name to use in h-entry, h-event, h-item, h-product, h-recipe, h-review, h-review-aggregate.

published.title: Published at
published.description: Date or date-time of when something was published or will be published (e.g. h-entry, h-recipe)

anyOf.description: Date-time formatted according to RFC3339 (time-zone is mandatory)

repost-of.title: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.
repost-of.description: URL to use in h-card, h-entry, h-event, etc.

rsvp.title: RSVP
rsvp.description: An RSVP is a reply to an event that says whether the sender is attending, is not attending, might attend, or is merely interested.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Summary to use in h-entry, h-recipe, h-resume.

syndication.title: Syndication
syndication.description: URL(s) of syndicated copies of this post. The property equivalent of rel-syndication.

updated.title: Updated at
updated.description: Date or date-time of when something was updated or will be updated (e.g. h-entry)

anyOf.description: Date-time formatted according to RFC3339 (time-zone is mandatory)

uri.title: UID
uri.description: URL/URI that uniquely/canonically identifies the object)

url.title: URL of the card, entry, event, etc.
url.description: URL to use in h-card, h-entry, h-event, etc.
